original: @46a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @46a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aa sambandha sarga drishtha n'a ma /
analyzed: aa sambandha sarga drishtha n'a ma /
translated: Asambandha-sarga-dristhana-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: zhen med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: zhen med kyi lta ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The View of Non-Attachment

original: yum phag mol phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: yum phag mol phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the mother Varahi.üîΩThis is the ground of the hero,

original: srid pa gsum gyi rgyu las 'di //üîΩdpa' bo bdag gi dkyus sar thungs //
analyzed: srid pa gsum gyi rgyu las 'di // dpa' bo bdag gi dkyus sar thungs //
translated: the cause of the three worlds.

original: bde gshegs lnga yi rta la zhon //
analyzed: bde gshegs lnga yi rta la zhon //
translated: Riding the horse of the five sugatas,

original: rta pa bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni //
analyzed: rta pa bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni //
translated: a hero like me, a horseman,

original: 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin //
translated: does not exist in the world.

original: brgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul //
analyzed: brgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul //
translated: Rushing, I tamed the wild horse of the three poisons,

original: lha chen bzhi yi sga yis bstad //
analyzed: lha chen bzhi yi sga yis bstad //
translated: strapped with the saddle of the four great gods,üîΩbridled with wisdom and means.

original: shes rab thabs kyis srab tu bcug / rta pa bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyis srab tu bcug / rta pa bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni //
translated: A hero like me, a horseman,

original: 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin //
translated: does not exist in the world.

original: brgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul //
analyzed: brgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul //
translated: Rushing, I tamed the wild horse of the three poisons,

original: nyon mongs bcu yi gsos cig byin //
analyzed: nyon mongs bcu yi gsos cig byin //
translated: I gave it fodder of the ten afflictions,

original: lta drug dbus kyi bres su bcug //
analyzed: lta drug dbus kyi bres su bcug //
translated: I put it in the middle of the yoke of the six views.

original: brgyugs bas dug gsum rta rgod btul //
analyzed: brgyugs bas dug gsum rta rgod btul //
translated: Rushing, I tamed the wild horse of the three poisons,

original: rta pa bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni //
analyzed: rta pa bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni //
translated: a hero like me, a horseman,

original: 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin //
translated: does not exist in the world.

original: bla ma lung gi ral gri thogs //
analyzed: bla ma lung gi ral gri thogs //
translated: I took up the sword of the guru's prophecy,

original: @46b tshangs pa'i gnas drug steng du 'gro //üîΩrta pa bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni //
analyzed: @46b tshangs pa'i gnas drug steng du 'gro // rta pa bdag 'dra'i dpa' bo ni //
translated: The six abodes of BrahmƒÅ are above.

analyzed: 'jig rten na ni yod ma yin //
translated: There is no hero like me in the world

original: brgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul //
analyzed: brgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod btul //
translated: Who, having ridden the horse of the three poisons,

original: phyogs bcu dag tu brgyugs pas kyang //
analyzed: phyogs bcu dag tu brgyugs pas kyang //

original: brgyugs pas dug gsum rta rgod thul //

translated: Who, having ridden the horse of the three poisons,üîΩRides it in the ten directionsüîΩWithout a trace of the horse's hoof.
